settings.sftpgo_explanation_tooltips: SFTPGo provides a user interface and a SFTP service for uploading your websites

settings.tcp_port_already_used: The TCP port is already used by another service
settings.path_pattern: Web path for the web application, like '/sftpgo'
settings.webpath_already_used_in_traefik: This web path is already used by another application in the web proxy.
settings.sftp_tcp_port_number_gte: The TCP port must be greater or equal than 1024
settings.sftp_tcp_port_invalid_type: The TCP port is not valid, it must be an integer in the range 1024-65535
settings.sftp_tcp_port_tips: This port is needed to connect a sftp client to the sftp server: sftp -P port_number user@hostname
settings.sftpgo_login_tips: The default login:password is admin:admin, you must change it at the first login
settings.sftp_tcp_port_number_lte: The TCP port must be lower or equal than 65535

virtualhosts.sftpgo_login_tips: The default login:password is {user}:{user}, you must change it at the first login
